welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Panchimalco, the charming city known for its vibrant culture and colorful handicrafts. Get ready to immerse yourself in its beauty and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ilopango International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ilopango International Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after completing a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Salvador International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Salvador International Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
